name: Waterloo Fundraiser
description:
A unique bullet-hell experience where the player can't stop shooting and must avoid hitting enemies, whilst getting hit themselves.

Made in 3 days for Wowie Jam 3. Made in Unity. WebGL version of the game has some issues with the end screen at times so the downloadable .EXE is the recommended version.

Take control of world famous super-solider Karnage Gristle as he attempts to save the civilians of the annual Waterloo Station Fundraiser event from evil attackers.

Armed with a gun that can't stop firing and a hoard of civilians throwing money at their hero, Gristle finds himself in a unique bullet-hell experience where he must get hit by as many projectiles as possible while trying to miss as many of his own shots as he can.

Watch out for flying power-up blocks that can strengthen your arsenal by upgrading your guns and grenades, as well as reducing the time it takes to reload.

All assets and code made during the course of the jam.

Music credit: Angry Groceries on Youtube

-----------------------------------------  /IMPORTANT/ -------------------------------------------

If ran on browser, the game will crash on the score screen. It is advised you play on an .exe instead to avoid this. The game runs fine otherwise   

Controls

WASD - Move

Mouse Pointer- Aim

Dev High Score 46910
